entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
